data.quote: A ship in port is safe, but that's not what ships are built for.
data.author: Grace Hopper

data.quote: It is often easier to ask for forgiveness than to ask for permission.
data.author: Grace Hopper

data.quote: You don't manage people; you manage things. You lead people.
data.author: Grace Hopper

data.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
data.author: Florence Nightingale

data.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
data.author: Amelia Earhart

data.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
data.author: Alice Walker

data.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful.
data.author: Malala Yousafzai

data.quote: Knowing what must be done does away with fear.
data.author: Rosa Parks

data.quote: No matter how difficult and painful it may be, nothing sounds as good to the soul as the truth.
data.author: Martha Beck

data.quote: Be first and be lonely.
data.author: Ginni Rometty

data.quote: Step out of the history that is holding you back. Step into the new story you are willing to create.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.quote: What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.
data.author: Jane Goodall

data.quote: A good compromise is one where everybody makes a contribution.
data.author: Angela Merkel

data.quote: I choose to make the rest of my life the best of my life.
data.author: Louise Hay

data.quote: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
data.author: Coco Chanel

data.quote: It’s one of the greatest gifts you can give yourself, to forgive. Forgive everybody.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: Change your life today. Don’t gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
data.author: Simone de Beauvoir

data.quote: If you’re not making some notable mistakes along the way, you’re certainly not taking enough business and career chances.
data.author: Sallie Krawcheck

data.quote: Normal is not something to aspire to, it’s something to get away from.
data.author: Jodie Foster
